Components

Borders

.ls-border.ls-border
.ls-border.ls-border-vertical
.ls-border.ls-border-horizontal 
<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">

		<div class="ls-well ls-well--white ls-border ls-border-gray">
			.ls-border.ls-border
		</div>
		<div class="ls-well ls-well--white ls-border-vertical ls-border-blue">
			.ls-border.ls-border-vertical
		</div>
		<div class="ls-well ls-well--white ls-border-horizontal ls-border-red">
			.ls-border.ls-border-horizontal
		</div>

	</div>
</div>

Buttons

Colors

<button class="ls-button">Default Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--white">White Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--green">Green Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--faded ls-button--green">Faded Green Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--blue">Blue Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--yellow">Yellow Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--red">Red Button</button>

Outline

<button class="ls-button ls-button--outline">Default Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--outline ls-button--white">White Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--outline ls-button--green">Green Button</button>

Sizing

<button class="ls-button ls-button--xl">Extra Large Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--lg">Large Button</button>
<button class="ls-button">Regular Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--sm">Small Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--xs">Extra Small Button</button>

Button Shaped Like A Link

<button class="ls-button ls-button--link">Link Button</button>

Block

<button class="ls-button ls-button--block">Block Button</button>
<button class="ls-button ls-button--block">Block Button</button>

Card

Pickled single-origin coffee prism DIY, fashion axe locavore tote bag poke. Chillwave mixtape succulents asymmetrical af.

				<img src="http://placehold.it/150x100">

					<p>Polaroid everyday carry marfa leggings tumblr kickstarter. Raw denim tattooed normcore woke, direct trade enamel pin 3 wolf moon mumblecore aesthetic drinking vinegar squid.</p>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="ls-card">
				<div class="ls-well ls-well--white">
					<p>Synth offal put a bird on it hella, snackwave narwhal actually green juice cold-pressed farm-to-table activated charcoal kickstarter butcher vegan. Bushwick 90's thundercats kickstarter food truck, slow-carb small batch selvage selfies master cleanse

</div>

Form Elements

Text Input

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-8 col-md-6 col-lg-4">

		<label for="text-input">Label</label>
		<input class="ls-input" type="text" id="text-input">

	</div>
</div>

Text Input With Icon

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-8 col-md-6 col-lg-4">

		<label for="text-input-with-icon">Label</label>
		<span class="ls-input-icon-wrap">
            <input class="ls-input" type="text" id="text-input-with-icon">
            <i class="fa fa-dollar"></i>
        </span>

	</div>
</div>

Text Input With Addon

At Start
At End 
<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-8 col-md-6 col-lg-4">

		<label for="text-input-with-addon-at-start">Label</label>
		<span class="ls-input-group">
            <span class="ls-input-group-addon">
                At Start
            </span>
		<input class="ls-input" type="text" id="text-input-with-addon-at-start">
		</span>

		<br>

		<label for="text-input-with-addon-at-end">Label</label>
		<span class="ls-input-group">
            <input class="ls-input" type="text" id="text-input-with-addon-at-end">
            <span class="ls-input-group-addon">
                At End
            </span>
		</span>

	</div>
</div>

Text Input With Button

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-8 col-md-6 col-lg-4">

		<label for="text-input-with-button">Label</label>
		<span class="ls-input-group">
            <input class="ls-input" type="text" id="text-input-with-button">
            <span class="ls-input-group-button">
                <button class="ls-button ls-button--blue">Do the Thing</button>
            </span>
		</span>

	</div>
</div>

Textarea

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-8 col-md-6 col-lg-4">

		<label for="text-area">Label</label>
		<textarea class="ls-input" id="text-area" rows="8"></textarea>

	</div>
</div>

Select Menu

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-8 col-md-6 col-lg-4">

		<label for="select-menu">Label</label>
		<select class="ls-input" name="" id="select-menu">
            <option value="">Option 1</option>
            <option value="">Option 2</option>
            <option value="">Option 3</option>
            <option value="">Option 4</option>
            <option value="">Option 5</option>
        </select>

	</div>
</div>

Lists

Comma Separated

Adds commas between each <li> and an ampersand to the last one.

  • Example first item
  • Next item
  • Last item
<ul class="ls-list-commas">
	<li>Example first item</li>
	<li>Next item</li>
	<li>Last item</li>
</ul>

Inline

Useful for .badge elements

  • Lorem ipsum
  • Aliquam tincidunt
  • Vestibulum auctor 
<ul class="ls-list-inline">
	<li>
		<span class="badge">Lorem ipsum</span>
	</li>
	<li>
		<span class="badge">Aliquam tincidunt</span>
	</li>
	<li>
		<span class="badge">Vestibulum auctor</span>
	</li>
</ul>

Panel

Panel

Food truck glossier next level cliche, fanny pack irony coloring book waistcoat hell of single-origin coffee bicycle rights kombucha. Ugh copper mug art party, portland vape bushwick fanny pack sustainable pabst.

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">

		<div class="ls-panel">
			<div class="ls-panel-section">
				<p>Food truck glossier next level cliche, fanny pack irony coloring book waistcoat hell of single-origin coffee bicycle rights kombucha. Ugh copper mug art party, portland vape bushwick fanny pack sustainable pabst.</p>
			</div>
		</div>

	</div>
</div>

Panel With Border And Shadow

	<div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6">

		<div class="ls-panel has-top-border has-shadow">

				<p>Put a bird on it actually cray viral listicle, williamsburg godard blog. Etsy migas fanny pack, letterpress prism pok pok man braid authentic wayfarers iPhone celiac crucifix asymmetrical. Austin wolf brunch direct trade tbh shoreditch.</p>
			</div>
		</div>

	</div>
</div>

Text Utilities

Alignment

Left-aligned text

Right-aligned text

Center-aligned text

<p class="ls-align-left">Left-aligned text</p>
<p class="ls-align-right">Right-aligned text</p>
<p class="ls-align-center">Center-aligned text</p>

Casing

capitalized text

uppercase text

LOWERCASE TEXT

<p class="ls-capitalize">capitalized text</p>
<p class="ls-uppercase">uppercase text</p>
<p class="ls-lowercase">LOWERCASE TEXT</p>

Emphasis

Normal Text

Bold text

Light text

Italic text

Underlined text

<p class="ls-normal">Normal Text</p>
<p class="ls-bold">Bold text</p>
<p class="ls-light-text">Light text</p>
<p class="ls-italic">Italic text</p>
<p class="ls-underline">Underlined text</p>

Formatting

Text will not wrap

This will force text wrap

<p class="ls-nowrap">Text will not wrap</p>
<p class="ls-formatted-text">This will force text wrap</p>

Highlighted Text

Paragraph text with some words that are highlighted, and some words that are not. 

<p>
	Paragraph text with
	<span class="ls-highlight">some words that are highlighted</span>, and some words that are not.
</p>

Horizontal Rules

<hr class="ls-size-0">
<hr class="ls-size-6">
<hr class="ls-size-9">
<hr class="ls-size-12">

Sizing

ls-size-9

ls-size-10

ls-size-11

ls-size-12

ls-size-14

ls-size-15

ls-size-16

ls-size-18

ls-size-21

ls-size-24

ls-size-27

ls-size-30

ls-size-36

<p class="ls-size-9">ls-size-9</p>
<p class="ls-size-10">ls-size-10</p>
<p class="ls-size-11">ls-size-11</p>
<p class="ls-size-12">ls-size-12</p>
<p class="ls-size-14">ls-size-14</p>
<p class="ls-size-15">ls-size-15</p>
<p class="ls-size-16">ls-size-16</p>
<p class="ls-size-18">ls-size-18</p>
<p class="ls-size-21">ls-size-21</p>
<p class="ls-size-24">ls-size-24</p>
<p class="ls-size-27">ls-size-27</p>
<p class="ls-size-30">ls-size-30</p>
<p class="ls-size-36">ls-size-36</p>

Truncate

This text is truncated 

<p style="max-width: 100px;">
	<span class="ls-truncate">This text is truncated</span>
</p>

Wells

Default well
White well
Green well
Blue well
Yellow well
Red well

	<div class="ls-panel-section">
		<div class="ls-well">
			Default well
		</div>
		<div class="ls-well ls-well--white">
			White well
		</div>
		<div class="ls-well ls-well--green">
			Green well
		</div>
		<div class="ls-well ls-well--blue">
			Blue well
		</div>
		<div class="ls-well ls-well--yellow">
			Yellow well
		</div>
		<div class="ls-well ls-well--red">
			Red well
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
